"Haha. Perceptor you may think that you can cause darkness.  
But you must remember, where there is fire.  There is light."  
Flicking his arm back so that the pistol went towards Switchblade, 
his position known by thier internal link, he brough his other hand 
up, his massive sword coming out and igniting in flames lighting 
the whole room.  Then with a massive swing brought the sword 
down towards Perceptor his trail of fire following.
